metrics.label: Offensive Creation
metrics.description: Self-creation volume and efficiency per 75 possessions.

metrics.label: Half-Court Shotmaking
metrics.description: Difficulty-adjusted shot quality and accuracy in half-court sets.

metrics.label: Passing Vision
metrics.description: High-value assists, skip reads, and delivery creativity.

metrics.label: Rim Pressure
metrics.description: Drives and paint touches turning into rim attempts and fouls.

metrics.label: Rebound Dominance
metrics.description: Share of available rebounds secured across both ends.

metrics.label: Defensive Playmaking
metrics.description: Stocks (steals + blocks) and deflection activity that swing possessions.

metrics.label: Post Efficiency
metrics.description: Post-up scoring efficiency blended with playmaking kick-outs.

metrics.label: Stretch Gravity
metrics.description: Perimeter gravity measured by defender distance and 3-point volume.

metrics.label: Tempo Control
metrics.description: Pace orchestration, transition effectiveness, and flow control.

metrics.label: Clutch Index
metrics.description: Two-way impact during the final five minutes of close games.

metrics.label: Durability Index
metrics.description: Availability and workload sustained over the last three seasons.

metrics.label: Processing Speed
metrics.description: Decision-making speed versus complex defensive coverages.
